src_original: teṣāṃ viśodhanārthaṃ tu vinayaṃ jñātavān svayam // 3 //
yathā padmaṃ suraktaṃ tu rāgadoṣairna lipyate /

mahāsukhottamasiddhirmahābodhisattvānāṃ sarvatathāgatamahābodhyuttamasiddhyai saṃvartate /  sarvatathāgatamahābodhyuttamasiddhirmahābodhisattvānāṃ sarvamahāmārapramardanottamasiddhyai saṃvartate /  sarvamahāmārapramardanottamasiddhirmahābodhisattvānāṃ sakalamahātraidhātukaiśvaryottamasiddhyai saṃvartate /  sakalamahātraidhātukaiśvaryottamasiddhirmahābodhisattvānāmaśeṣānavaśeṣasarvasattvadhātuparitrāṇasarvasattvahita - sukhaparamātyantamahāsukhottamasiddhyai saṃvartate iti //
